title: Rome: Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Palatine Hill Guided Tour.
directions: From Briarcliff Road/North Decatur Rd go north and take right on N. Emory Rd go about miles or till house numbers 1440 Emory Rd. NE and look for trail on left.<br /><br /><br /><br />From Briar Cliff Road and North Drid Hills go south 2 miles past Kroger shopping plaza on left and past Fox Channel five take left.
highlights: Visit the famous beaches of Goa

itinerary.title: Delhi to Goa
itinerary.details: Arrival at Goa from Delhi. Check-in at hotel and relax at the beach.

itinerary.title: North Goa Sightseeing
itinerary.details: Visit Calangute Beach, Baga Beach, Fort Aguada, and Anjuna Beach.

itinerary.title: South Goa Tour
itinerary.details: Explore Old Goa churches, Miramar Beach, Dona Paula, and local markets.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.details: Check-out from hotel and return to Delhi.
